content: 思路: // @Title: 点名 (点名) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-03-01 21:45:07 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 42.3 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int missingNumber(int[] nums) { int left=0; int right=nums.length-1; if(nums[right]==right){ return right+1; } if(right==0){ return 0; } while(left<=right){ int mid=left+(right-left)/2; if(nums[mid]==mid){ left=mid+1; }else if(nums[mid]>mid&&((mid>0&&nums[mid-1]==mid-1)||mid==0)){ return mid; }else{ right=mid-1; } } return -1; } }
